thread.title: Actor is Smith's muse for detective character
thread.title_full: Actor is Smith's muse for detective character

title: Actor is Smith's muse for detective character
text:
Share Updated: 12:37 pm 
Punk icon Patti Smith is working on a new detective novel with British actor Clive Owen as her muse. 
Promoting her new book, M Train, at Hearst Tower in New York on Monday, Smith revealed she has already started work on her next book. 
She said, "I have my detective. I've been working on it for a few years at my own pace." 
And when she was asked for more information about her literary hero, she told Billboard, "It's Clive Owen." 
Smith added, "I don't like the crime or the stress of crime, (but) I like the mind of the detective." 
Fans should expect her literary hero to bear similarities to late author Henning Mankell's troubled Kurt Wallander, who she believes is one of the greatest detective characters. 
Mankell lost his battle with cancer on Monday, aged 67. Copyright WENN.com
